collection_holder_name: Stanford University, Archive of Recorded Sound
pageContext.collection_title: Polish Arts and Culture Foundation Collection
pageContext.collection_description: Broadcasts on Polskie Radio i Telewizja, distributed to Polish Arts and Culture Foundation in the U.S., interviews with Polish scholars, filmmakers, artists and discussions of Polish art, science, literature, history.
pageContext.collection_extent: 3 boxes (69 open reel tapes on 3", 5" and 7" reels))
